-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Type equality check
--   
--   This packages provides a type equality check whose implementation is
--   basically the one from the HList library.
@package type-equality-check
@version 0.0.0.3

module Data.TypeEq
class TypeEq type1 type2 result | type1 type2 -> result
typeEq :: TypeEq type1 type2 result => type1 -> type2 -> result
instance [overlap ok] TypeCastHelperHelper () soleType soleType
instance [overlap ok] TypeCastHelperHelper dummy type1 type2 => TypeCastHelper dummy type1 type2
instance [overlap ok] TypeCastHelper () type1 type2 => TypeCast type1 type2
instance [overlap ok] TypeCast False result => TypeEq type1 type2 result
instance [overlap ok] TypeEq soleType soleType True
